task.title: Situations
task.shortdesc: Marvel Enterprise Portal runs tests called Situations on systems where monitoring agents are installed. When the conditions of a situation have been met, an event occurs, and an event indicator is displayed over the applicable items in the Navigator. The Navigator alerts you of changing conditions in the systems you are monitoring.

taskbody.prereq:
To view the Situation editor, your user ID must have necessary permissions. If you see any of these icons in the Navigator now, move the mouse pointer over an event indicator to open a flyover listing of the situations that caused the events at that level of the Navigator and below.
When a condition changes, the associated item is marked with an icon as mentioned in the table below:
Icon Condition
Fatal
Critical
Minor
Warning
Harmless
Informational or Unknown
taskbody.context: To open a situation, do the following steps:

step.cmd: Right click the system in the Navigator and click Situations.
The Situation editor opens with a list of situations on the left. This is where you can view and edit situations or create new ones.
Click anyone of the situation name in the tree to see the Situation editor tabs.
To view, add, and change the conditions being tested, click Formula.
To view and specify the systems on which to run the situation click Distribution.
To write comments or instructions to be read in the event results workspace, click Expert Advice.
To send a command to the managed system, click Action.
Click Until to close the event after a period of time or when another situation is true.
When you are done, you can close the Situation editor by clicking on the Cancel button.
